Once upon a time, there was a little boy named Max who loved to play in the snow. One day, he decided to build a snowman, and he spent hours shaping and molding the snow into a beautiful creation.

Max was heartbroken, but he didn't let the bullies get to him. Instead, he decided to show them just how awesome his snowman was.

He took a nearby carrot and stuck it in the snowman's face, creating a bright and cheerful smile. Then, he grabbed a broom and used it to make the snowman a tall, majestic hat.

The bullies were amazed by the transformation, and they started to apologize for their harsh words. Max forgave them and invited them to play in the snow with him.

From that day on, Max and his friends had the best time playing in the snow together, and they all learned a valuable lesson about the importance of kindness and friendship.

Once upon a time, there was a little boy named Max who loved to play in the snow. One day, he decided to build a snowman, and he spent hours shaping and molding the snow into a beautiful creation.

Max was heartbroken, but he didn't let the bullies get to him. Instead, he decided to show them just how awesome his snowman was.

He took a nearby carrot and stuck it in the snowman's face, creating a bright and cheerful smile. Then, he grabbed a broom and used it to make the snowman a tall, majestic hat.
